categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Fact-finding mission to the Outer Rim

A fact-finding mission to the Outer Rim was undertaken by members of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War waged against the Galactic Empire. Led by Commander Lina Graf, a team of rebels crash-landed on Mustafar aboard the starship Auric and explored Fortress Vader on the volcanic planet.
